titleStmt.title: Theses philosophicae quas auspice & propitio D.O.M. adolescentes, magisterii candidati, in Academia Mareschallana, die 21 Iulii, Anno 1637. In publico clarissimorum philosophorum confessu propugnabunt, ab aurora ad meridiem.
titleStmt.author: Seton, John.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 22263 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
